title: Misc quality vintage tobacco stuff for sale
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Misc quality vintage tobacco stuff for sale
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Keith O'Leary
*** Broken Timing Belt and Retirement Sale ***

I will accept PayPal, MOs, checks, cash and will hold any lot for 30 days. I will pay all shipping except on the 2 banners. Those I plan on giving to Mailboxes etc for packing/ shipping and charging the buyer 1/2 the total cost. First come, first served.


[URL="http://i45.photobucket.com/albums/f92/vwtdi55/For%20Sale/n162_glass397.jpg"]N162 Jack Glass[/URL] SGC 40 [URL="http://i45.photobucket.com/albums/f92/vwtdi55/For%20Sale/n162_glass398.jpg"]photo 2[/URL] [URL="http://i45.photobucket.com/albums/f92/vwtdi55/For%20Sale/n162_glass396.jpg"]photo 3[/URL] One of the nicer SGC 40 Glasscocks you'll see. If you tilt the card, you can see some diagonal surface "wrinkling" starting at Jack's left calf extending towards the lower right corner of the card. This is not visable looking at the card straight on. An SGC 40 example just sold in Goodwin's auction last night for 1710 plus juice, this one is nicer. SOLD
[URL="http://i45.photobucket.com/albums/f92/vwtdi55/For%20Sale/59_fleer67416.jpg"]59 Fleer Ted Williams #67[/URL] SGC 84 [URL="http://i45.photobucket.com/albums/f92/vwtdi55/For%20Sale/59_fleer67417.jpg"]photo 2[/URL] free to first forum member who spends GONE.

[URL="http://i45.photobucket.com/albums/f92/vwtdi55/For%20Sale/59_fleer414.jpg"]59 Fleer Ted Williams #75[/URL] SGC 80 [URL="http://i45.photobucket.com/albums/f92/vwtdi55/For%20Sale/59_fleer75415.jpg"]photo 2[/URL] free to 2nd forum member who spends 125.
